title: Book Bolt Keyword Search Tutorial | Earn Passive Income on Amazon KDP With Low & Medium Content Book
description:
Subscribe to Book Bolt here: https://bookbolt.io/7982.html  #affiliate 

Use code "unwind" to get 20% off your subscription

In this video I give you an overview of how to use the built-in product Research tool within Book Bolt to gather intel about books selling on Amazon KDP.

Use this lesson as another step for creating low and medium content books to sell on Amazon KDP to earn passive income. This software was recently overhauled and updated in October 2025 and I'll be showing you all the updates and how to use the tools in it. 

#amazonkdp #bookbolt #lowcontentbook #lowcontentbookpublishing
